issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a default classic app.
2. Build it to an android Jellybean & below devices from command line using {{appc run}} command.

h5.Actual Results:
1. The apk fails to install on the devices with error:
{code}
[TRACE] Executing: /Users/lchoudhary/Desktop/android-sdk-macosx/platform-tools/adb -s emulator-5554 install -r -d /Users/lchoudhary/Desktop/testloki/build/android/bin/testloki.apk
[ERROR] Failed to install apk on "emulator-5554"
[ERROR] Error: Unknown option: -d
{code}
2. We see a failure from studio as well but the error is not clear from studio console logs.

h5.Expected Results:
1. The apk should be installed without any issues on jellybean & lower devices.
fields.summary: Android: '-d' flag in adb install CLI command fails to install apk on Jellybean & below
fields.environment:
Appc Studio : 4.8.1.201612050850
SDK Version : 6.0.2.GA
Mac OS Version : 10.12.3
Xcode Version : Xcode 8.2.1 Build version 8C1002
Appc CLI AND Appc NPM : {"NPM":"4.2.8","CLI":"6.1.0"}
Ti CLI : 5.0.11
Alloy : 1.9.5
Node : v4.6.0
Device: Android Jellybean & below
